message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it's a great deal considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $180. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $180, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $150?
